class.name: TMUserGDScriptSyntaxHighlighter
class.brief_description: GDScript syntax highlighter usable in projects.
class.description: This class has similar code to Godot's internal GDScriptSyntaxHighlighter class, but GDScriptSyntaxHighlighter is an editor-only class. TMUserGDScriptSyntaxHighlighter is usable in projects, it is meant to be used for highlighting GDScript code in a [CodeEdit] or [TextEdit]. It is intended to be used with [TMUserGDScript] to provide syntax highlighting for dynamic user scripts at runtime.
